Package game.modes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimulationI
    Interface defining the structure and behavior of a simulation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutomaticMode
    The AutomaticMode class represents a simulation mode where the game is automatically executed without user interaction.
    ManualMode
    The ManualMode class provides a simulation mode where players can manually interact with the game environment and make decisions, such as selecting routes, using items, or staying at the current position.
    ModeManager
    ModeManager is a class responsible for managing the core functionalities of the game, including creating a player, selecting a mission, and starting the game in manual or automatic simulation modes.
    Simulation
    The Simulation class represents the core functionality to simulate a strategic mission-based game.
